caption.p: Photomicrograph of the effects of Tmsb w on the histology of mouse liver infected by PbB: (a) uninfected mice, (b) untreated mice, (c) chloroquine-treated mice, and (d) Tmsb w-treated mice; HE Ã—400. HA: hepatic artery; BC: biliary canal; PV: portal vein; H: hepatocyte; SC: sinusoid capillary; H: dilate hepatocyte; LI: leucocyte infiltration; mP: malarial pigment; FI: inflammatory focal point.
